verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Gittith <WH1665>, A Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. How amiable <WH3039> are thy tabernacles <WH4908>, O YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> !

My soul <WH5315> longeth <WH3700> <WH8738>, yea, even fainteth <WH3615> <WH8804> for the courts <WH2691> of the YY <WH3068>: my heart <WH3820> and my flesh <WH1320> crieth out <WH7442> <WH8762> for the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH410>.

Yea, the sparrow <WH6833> hath found <WH4672> <WH8804> an house <WH1004>, and the swallow <WH1866> a nest <WH7064> for herself, where she may lay <WH7896> <WH8804> her young <WH667>, even thine altars <WH4196>, O YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, my King <WH4428>, and my 'Elohim <WH430>.
Blessed <WH835> are they that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in thy house <WH1004>: they will be still praising <WH1984> <WH8762> thee. Selah <WH5542>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> whose strength <WH5797> is in thee; in whose heart <WH3824> are the ways <WH4546> of them.

Who passing <WH5674> <WH8802> through the valley <WH6010> of Baca <WH1056> <WH8676> <WH1057> make <WH7896> <WH8799> it a well <WH4599>; the rain <WH4175> also filleth <WH5844> <WH8799> the pools <WH1293>.
They go <WH3212> <WH8799> from strength <WH2428> to strength <WH2428>, every one of them in TZiyon <WH6726> appeareth <WH7200> <WH8735> before 'Elohim <WH430>.
O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> TZva'ot <WH6635>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my prayer <WH8605>: give ear <WH238> <WH8685>, O 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290>. Selah <WH5542>.
Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430> our shield <WH4043>, and look <WH5027> <WH8685> upon the face <WH6440> of thine anointed <WH4899>.

For a day <WH3117> in thy courts <WH2691> is better <WH2896> than a thousand <WH505>. I had rather <WH977> <WH8804> be a doorkeeper <WH5605> <WH8705> in the house <WH1004> of my 'Elohim <WH430>, than to dwell <WH1752> <WH8800> in the tents <WH168> of wickedness <WH7562>.

For the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> is a sun <WH8121> and shield <WH4043>: the YY <WH3068> will give <WH5414> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> and glory <WH3519>: no good <WH2896> thing will he withhold <WH4513> <WH8799> from them that walk <WH1980> <WH8802> uprightly <WH8549>.
O YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> that trusteth <WH982> <WH8802> in thee.
